titles.ar: بَابُ الْإِشَارَةِ وَ النَّصِّ إِلَى صَاحِبِ الدَّارِ ( عليه السلام )
titles.en: Chapter 76 – The Indication and the wordings upon the Master<sup>asws</sup> of the world (12<sup>th</sup> Imam<sup>asws</sup>)

titles.ar: بَابُ الْإِشَارَةِ وَ النَّصِّ إِلَى صَاحِبِ الدَّارِ ( عليه السلام )
titles.en: Chapter 76 – The Indication and the wordings upon the Master<sup>asws</sup> of the world (12<sup>th</sup> Imam<sup>asws</sup>)

verses.text: عَلِيُّ بْنُ مُحَمَّدٍ عَنْ مُحَمَّدِ بْنِ عَلِيِّ بْنِ بِلَالٍ قَالَ خَرَجَ إِلَيَّ مِنْ أَبِي مُحَمَّدٍ قَبْلَ مُضِيِّهِ بِسَنَتَيْنِ يُخْبِرُنِي بِالْخَلَفِ مِنْ بَعْدِهِ ثُمَّ خَرَجَ إِلَيَّ مِنْ قَبْلِ مُضِيِّهِ بِثَلَاثَةِ أَيَّامٍ يُخْبِرُنِي بِالْخَلَفِ مِنْ بَعْدِهِ .

translations.name: hubeali
translations.text:
Ali Bin Muhammad, from Muhammad Bin Ali Bin Bilal who said, 
‘There came out to me from Abu Muhammad<sup>asws</sup> (11<sup>th</sup> Imam<sup>asws</sup>) before his<sup>asws</sup> passing away by two years informing me of the replacement (Imam<sup>asws</sup>) from after him<sup>asws</sup>. Then there came to me from before his<sup>asws</sup> passing away by three days informing me with the replacement (Imam<sup>asws</sup> from after him<sup>asws</sup>)’.

verses.text: مُحَمَّدُ بْنُ يَحْيَى عَنْ أَحْمَدَ بْنِ إِسْحَاقَ عَنْ أَبِي هَاشِمٍ الْجَعْفَرِيِّ قَالَ قُلْتُ لِأَبِي مُحَمَّدٍ ( عليه السلام ) جَلَالَتُكَ تَمْنَعُنِي مِنْ مَسْأَلَتِكَ فَتَأْذَنُ لِي أَنْ أَسْأَلَكَ فَقَالَ سَلْ قُلْتُ يَا سَيِّدِي هَلْ لَكَ وَلَدٌ فَقَالَ نَعَمْ فَقُلْتُ فَإِنْ حَدَثَ بِكَ حَدَثٌ فَأَيْنَ أَسْأَلُ عَنْهُ قَالَ بِالْمَدِينَةِ .

translations.name: hubeali
translations.text:
Muhammad Bin Yahya, from Ahmad Bin Is’haq, from Abu Hashim Al Ja’fary who said, 
‘I said to Abu Muhammad<sup>asws</sup> (11<sup>th</sup> Imam<sup>asws</sup>) ‘Your<sup>asws</sup> majesty prevents me from asking you<sup>asws</sup>, so if you<sup>asws</sup> were to permit me, I shall ask you<sup>asws</sup>’. So he<sup>asws</sup> said: ‘Ask’. I said, ‘O my Chief! Is there a son<sup>asws</sup> for you<sup>asws</sup>?’ So he<sup>asws</sup> said: ‘Yes’. So I said, ‘So if there occurs with you an occurrence (of death), so where shall I ask about him<sup>asws</sup>?’ He<sup>asws</sup> said: ‘At Al-Medina’’.

verses.text: عَلِيُّ بْنُ مُحَمَّدٍ عَنْ جَعْفَرِ بْنِ مُحَمَّدٍ الْكُوفِيِّ عَنْ جَعْفَرِ بْنِ مُحَمَّدٍ الْمَكْفُوفِ عَنْ عَمْرٍو الْأَهْوَازِيِّ قَالَ أَرَانِي أَبُو مُحَمَّدٍ ابْنَهُ وَ قَالَ هَذَا صَاحِبُكُمْ مِنْ بَعْدِي .

translations.name: hubeali
translations.text:
Ali Bin Muhammad, from Ja’far Bin Muhammad Al Kufy, from Ja’far Bin Muhammad Al Makfouf, from Amro Al Ahwazy who said, 
‘Abu Muhammad<sup>asws</sup> (11<sup>th</sup> Imam<sup>asws</sup>) showed me his<sup>asws</sup> son and said: ‘This is your Master<sup>asws</sup> from after me<sup>asws</sup>’’.

verses.text: عَلِيُّ بْنُ مُحَمَّدٍ عَنْ حَمْدَانَ الْقَلَانِسِيِّ قَالَ قُلْتُ لِلْعَمْرِيِّ قَدْ مَضَى أَبُو مُحَمَّدٍ فَقَالَ لِي قَدْ مَضَى وَ لَكِنْ قَدْ خَلَّفَ فِيكُمْ مَنْ رَقَبَتُهُ مِثْلُ هَذِهِ وَ أَشَارَ بِيَدِهِ .

translations.name: hubeali
translations.text:
Ali Bin Muhammad, from Hamdan Al Qalanasy who said, 
‘I said to Al-Amry, ‘Has Abu Muhammad<sup>asws</sup> (11<sup>th</sup> Imam<sup>asws</sup>) passed away?’ So he said to me, ‘He<sup>asws</sup> had passed away, but he<sup>asws</sup> has left among you all the one whose neck is like this’, and gestured with his hand’. (Al-Amry was the first representative of Imam Al-Mahdi<sup>asws</sup>).

verses.text: الْحُسَيْنُ بْنُ مُحَمَّدٍ الْأَشْعَرِيُّ عَنْ مُعَلَّى بْنِ مُحَمَّدٍ عَنْ أَحْمَدَ بْنِ مُحَمَّدِ بْنِ عَبْدِ اللَّهِ قَالَ خَرَجَ عَنْ أَبِي مُحَمَّدٍ ( عليه السلام ) حِينَ قُتِلَ الزُّبَيْرِيُّ لَعَنَهُ اللَّهُ هَذَا جَزَاءُ مَنِ اجْتَرَأَ عَلَى اللَّهِ فِي أَوْلِيَائِهِ يَزْعُمُ أَنَّهُ يَقْتُلُنِي وَ لَيْسَ لِي عَقِبٌ فَكَيْفَ رَأَى قُدْرَةَ اللَّهِ فِيهِ وَ وُلِدَ لَهُ وَلَدٌ سَمَّاهُ م‏ح‏م‏د فِي سَنَةِ سِتٍّ وَ خَمْسِينَ وَ مِائَتَيْنِ .

translations.name: hubeali
translations.text:
Al Husayn Bin Muhammad Al Ashary, from Moalla Bin Muhammad, from Ahmad Bin Muhammad Bin Abdullah who said, 
‘There came out from Abu Muhammad<sup>asws</sup>, when Al-Zubeyri<sup>la</sup>, may Allah<sup>azwj</sup> Curse him<sup>la</sup> was killed: ‘This is a Recompense of the one who is audacious unto Allah<sup>azwj</sup> with regards to His<sup>azwj</sup> Guardians<sup>asws</sup>. He claimed that he would murder me<sup>asws</sup>, and there wouldn’t be an offspring for me<sup>asws</sup>? So how does he see the Determination of Allah<sup>azwj</sup> regarding him<sup>asws</sup>?’ And there was I<sup>asws</sup> was blessed with a son<sup>asws</sup>. He<sup>asws</sup> named him<sup>asws</sup> as M H M D (Abbreviated as it is not allowed to mention his<sup>asws</sup> name), in the year two hundred and fifty six’.

verses.text:
عَلِيُّ بْنُ مُحَمَّدٍ عَنِ الْحُسَيْنِ وَ مُحَمَّدٍ ابْنَيْ عَلِيِّ بْنِ إِبْرَاهِيمَ عَنْ مُحَمَّدِ بْنِ عَلِيِّ بْنِ عَبْدِ الرَّحْمَنِ الْعَبْدِيِّ مِنْ عَبْدِ قَيْسٍ عَنْ ضَوْءِ بْنِ عَلِيٍّ الْعِجْلِيِّ عَنْ رَجُلٍ مِنْ أَهْلِ فَارِسَ سَمَّاهُ قَالَ أَتَيْتُ سَامَرَّاءَ وَ لَزِمْتُ بَابَ أَبِي مُحَمَّدٍ ( عليه السلام ) فَدَعَانِي فَدَخَلْتُ عَلَيْهِ وَ سَلَّمْتُ فَقَالَ مَا الَّذِي أَقْدَمَكَ قَالَ قُلْتُ رَغْبَةٌ فِي خِدْمَتِكَ قَالَ فَقَالَ لِي فَالْزَمِ الْبَابَ 
قَالَ فَكُنْتُ فِي الدَّارِ مَعَ الْخَدَمِ ثُمَّ صِرْتُ أَشْتَرِي لَهُمُ الْحَوَائِجَ مِنَ السُّوقِ وَ كُنْتُ أَدْخُلُ عَلَيْهِمْ مِنْ غَيْرِ إِذْنٍ إِذَا كَانَ فِي الدَّارِ رِجَالٌ قَالَ فَدَخَلْتُ عَلَيْهِ يَوْماً وَ هُوَ فِي دَارِ الرِّجَالِ فَسَمِعْتُ حَرَكَةً فِي الْبَيْتِ فَنَادَانِي مَكَانَكَ لَا تَبْرَحْ فَلَمْ أَجْسُرْ أَنْ أَدْخُلَ وَ لَا أَخْرُجَ 
فَخَرَجَتْ عَلَيَّ جَارِيَةٌ مَعَهَا شَيْ‏ءٌ مُغَطًّى ثُمَّ نَادَانِيَ ادْخُلْ فَدَخَلْتُ وَ نَادَى الْجَارِيَةَ فَرَجَعَتْ إِلَيْهِ فَقَالَ لَهَا اكْشِفِي عَمَّا مَعَكِ فَكَشَفَتْ عَنْ غُلَامٍ أَبْيَضَ حَسَنِ الْوَجْهِ وَ كَشَفَ عَنْ بَطْنِهِ فَإِذَا شَعْرٌ نَابِتٌ مِنْ لَبَّتِهِ إِلَى سُرَّتِهِ أَخْضَرُ لَيْسَ بِأَسْوَدَ فَقَالَ هَذَا صَاحِبُكُمْ ثُمَّ أَمَرَهَا فَحَمَلَتْهُ فَمَا رَأَيْتُهُ بَعْدَ ذَلِكَ حَتَّى مَضَى أَبُو مُحَمَّدٍ ( عليه السلام ) .

translations.name: hubeali
translations.text:
Ali Bin Muhammad, from Al Husayn and Muhammad, two sons of Ali Bin Ibrahim, from Muhammad Bin Ali Bin Abdul Rahman Al Abdy, from Abd Qays, from Zou Bin Ali Al Ijaly, from a man of the people of Persia, he named him, said, 
‘I came to Samarra and necessitated the door of Abu Muhammad<sup>asws</sup> (11<sup>th</sup> Imam<sup>asws</sup>). So he<sup>asws</sup> invited me in and I went over to him<sup>asws</sup> and greeted. So he<sup>asws</sup> said: ‘What is that which made you come?’ I said, ‘Desire to serve you<sup>asws</sup>’. So he<sup>asws</sup> said to me: ‘So necessitate the door (be a doorman)’. 
He said, ‘So I used to be in the house with the servants. Then I came to be buying the necessaries for them from the market, and used to enter upon them from without a permission when there were men in the house. So I went over to him<sup>asws</sup> one day and he<sup>asws</sup> was in the room of the men, and I heard movement in the house. So he<sup>asws</sup> called out to me: ‘(Be) in your place and do not depart!’ So I couldn’t dare to enter nor exit.
So a maid came over to me, and with her was something covered. Then he<sup>asws</sup> called out to me: ‘Enter!’ So I entered, and he<sup>asws</sup> called out to the maid, so she returned to him<sup>asws</sup>. So he<sup>asws</sup> said to her: ‘Uncover from what is with you’. So she uncovered from a white boy, beautiful of face, and she uncovered from his<sup>asws</sup> belly, so there was a growth of green hair from his<sup>asws</sup> belly to his<sup>asws</sup> navel, without blackness. So he<sup>asws</sup> said: ‘This is your Master<sup>asws</sup>’. Then he<sup>asws</sup> ordered her, so she carried him<sup>asws</sup> away, and I did not see him<sup>asws</sup> after that until Abu Muhammad<sup>asws</sup> (11<sup>th</sup> Imam<sup>asws</sup>) passed away’.
